job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: stronguMinimum QualificationsbrustrongulliPassion for machine learning ML and understanding of industry trends especially as it relates to NLP deep learning large language models transfer learning etcliliExperience reading and implementing machine learning research papersliliStrong Python programming skills with demonstrated software development best practices including testing OOP etcliliFamiliarity with modern tools of the trade including TensorFlow andor PyTorch as well as SpaCy or another NLP libraryliliAbility to create and maintain scalable APIs that can serve model results with a wide variety of memory CPU GPU requirements as well as low latency well below 1 secondliliStrong DevOps skills and ability to maintain CI pipelines for everything from model training to model serving in productionliliComfort with nix Git and Github Docker liliExperience with Agile and assisting with largescale highly available productsbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliFamiliarity with modern ML frameworks such as DVC MLFlow or KubeflowliliExperience deploying and supporting applications on KubernetesliliExperience in cloud computing services especially AWSbrliulstronguJob SummarybrbrustrongThe Machine Learning Engineer designs and develops machine learning models that help our 70 million monthly users This team member develops research programs that evolve and adapt the stateoftheart SOTA results available in the literature and creates the rich infrastructure needed to support model development from prototyping to productionbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliAssess SOTA research to identify and prioritize research for prototyping and experimentationliliEstablish and evolve processes and infrastructure for training and evaluating ML modelsliliDevelop modern best practices for lowlatency model serving at scaleliliFind or create the required datasets and ensure they are managed for longevity and model reproducibilityliliParticipate in code reviews of your and your teams workliliCollaborate closely with data science project and product management team membersbrliulstronguWho We ArebrbrustrongDictionarycom is committed to eliminating anxiety with the English language through simple expertly crafted definitions the perfect synonyms and rich narratives about the intersection of words and culture We are the leading digital source for everything related to words and their meanings with 70 million monthly users and 100 million app installs We believe words are core to the human experience and as such weve made it our mission to deliver the best dictionary and thesaurus imaginable to the largest audience possiblebrbrThe Dictionarycom team exudes energy and a passion for words and language and is driven to invest in the people and products that will propel Dictionarycom forward another 20 yearsbrbrstrongDisclaimerbrbrstrongThis is an outline of the primary responsibilities of this position As with everything in life things change The tasks and responsibilities can be changed added to removed amended deleted and modified at any time by the leadership groupbrbrWe are
